titleStmt.title: SII 7.108: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 108. (A.R. No. 98 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
kuṟotaṉavaruṣam Āvaṇi 8 tiruvottūruṭaiyanāyiṉār
koyil tāṉattār pallavarāyarpiḷḷaikku caṇṭecura vilai
p piṟamāṇam paṇṇikkuṭuttapaṭi kālāṇṭaārkaḷteruvil pallavarāca
civaṉ ketārinātarmaṭattukku puliyarperumpākkattil naṉcey
nilattil kolam kuḻi 100 5 10 moṭiceṟu kuḻi 100 5 10 pirāyaṉ pirāyaṉ
2 kuḻi 100 5 10 murukkaṉkuṇṭil 5 10 Āka kuḻi 5 100 Inta kuḻi Añ
ñūṟṟukkum vilaippaṭi 100 Ippaṇam nūṟṟukkum Inta nilam cantiṟātit
tavaraiyum Aṉupavittuk koḷḷakkaṭavar Ākavum Inta nilattai
nokkivarum Araimaṉaiyiṟ piṟakkum paḻavari putuvari kāṇikkai taṭ
ṭāyam tiruvottūril Iṟukkum palavarikaḷum vecca viṉiviyokamu
m pāṭikāval talaiyāri merāmai Eppeṟpaṭṭa cakalavarikaḷum
koḷḷakkaṭavatuAllaĀkavum Ippaṭi cammatittu caṇṭecuravilai
ppiṟamāṇam paṇṇikkuṭuttom piḷḷai pallavarāyarkku tiruvottūru
ṭaiyanāyiṉār koyil tāṉaṟtārom Ivai cantiṟamavuliĀḻvār Eḻuttu Ivai
caivacekarapaṇṭitar Eḻuttu Ivai kampanāraṇaṉār Eḻuttu Ivai
nāyiṉār Eḻuttu Ivai koyilkaṇakku tiruveṇṇāḻippiramarāyaṉ
Eḻuttu Ivai āṉ Eḻuttu puvaṉāpatitevar Eḻuttu
kuṟotaṉa varuṣam Āvaṇi 8 piḷḷai pallavarāyar piḷḷai tiruvottūr
kālāṇṭaārkaḷil tiruppāṭṭu kāṅkeyar makaṉār pallavarācacivaṉun
tiruviṭṭukkuṭuttapaṭi nām tiruvottūril tāṉattārpakkal koṇṭa maṉai
yum puliyarperumpākkattil naṉceynilattil koṇṭa 5 100m maṉaiyum
cantiṟātittavaraiyum tāme Aṉupavittu nammuṭaiya maṭam naṉṟāka naṭatta
kkaṭavarākavum Ippaṭikkut tiruviṭu Iṭṭukkuṭuttamaikku Ivai
pallavarāyar Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 7.108 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
